name: 翁文慧
objective: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
schedule:
EOMP Seminar  (EOMP Program, Course No.: 176445, Fall 2012)

Schedule: 10:10AM ~ 12:00 pm, Wednesday
Instructor: Wen-Hui Weng  Chemical engineering building, 2F, Seminar room 205
TEL:(02) 27712171 ext. 2529, e-mail: wendywwh@ntut.edu.tw
Syllabus
Week　　Date　　Speaker/Topic　　Host

1　　09-19　　Introduction　　Prof. C. Su
2　　09-25(Tues) 4:00~6:00　　Hiroyuki Matsuzaka (Osaka Prefecture University)
Synthesis and Reactivity of Coordinatively Unsaturated Dinuclear Ruthenium Bridging Imido Complexes: Coupling Reactions Involving an Imido Group at Diruthenium Centers and Formation and Reactivities of a Trigonal-Planar μ3-Carbido Ligand at Multimetallic Centers　　Prof. F.-Y. Tsai 
3　　10-03　　http://anna-taiwan.rcas.sinica.edu.tw/sym2012/  select 8 talks
Prof. Weng

6　　10-24　　Reference Collection, Title and Reference Due　　Miss Chen
7　　10-31　　2nd Year proposal presentation 　　Prof. Weng
8　　11-07　　Proposed Experiments & Method 　　Prof. Weng
9　　11-14　　Mid-term exam.　　Prof. Weng
10　　11-21　　Expected Results and Time Line 　　Prof. Weng
11　　11-28　　Proposal Write Up 　　Prof. Weng
12　　12-05　　Final Proposal Due 　　Prof. Weng
13　　12-12　　Student presentation 　　Prof. Weng
14　　12-19　　Cheng, C.-L. (National Dong-Hwa University)
Raman application in Photoelectronic Materials　　Prof. C. Su

17　　01-09　　Student presentation　　Prof. Weng
18　　01-16　　Final exam　　         Prof. Weng
scorePolicy:
Seminar performance 40%  
Questions proposed on the classes and interact with participants 60%
materials:
1.Laptops are welcome to be used in the class.
2.The reading materials should be sent to participants ahead of time ( at least a week ago) to help them prepare questions.
